name: AsthmaDeviceHelper
0:
”Alexa, ask Asthma Device Helper how to use Advair Diskus.”
”How do I use Proair inhaler?”
”What are the instructions for using Breo Ellipta?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: asthma device helper
des:
The purpose of this skill is to help educate asthma patients on how to correctly use their inhalers. This skill describes in full detail instructions on how to use the following asthma devices: Proair Inhaler, Breo Ellipta, Advair Diskus, and Spiriva Respimat. 
The patient can ask alexa, "how do I use my proair inhaler?", and alexa will give them instructions on how to use that inhaler device.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
